fields.name: workers
fields.description: How many threads to use for mutation and execution

fields.name: executionWorkers
fields.description: How many threads to use for execution

fields.name: printIR
fields.description: Prints LLVM IR before/after mutations into stderr

fields.name: printIRBefore
fields.description: Prints LLVM IR before mutations into stderr

fields.name: printIRAfter
fields.description: Prints LLVM IR after mutations into stderr

fields.name: printIRToFile
fields.description: Prints LLVM IR (before or after) into a file instead of stderr

fields.name: traceMutants
fields.description: Adds debug `printf`s into generated LLVM IR around mutations

fields.name: coverage
fields.description: Prints more debug output when `coverage` filter is enabled

fields.name: gitDiff
fields.description: Prints more debug output when `gitDiff` filter is enabled

fields.name: filters
fields.description: Prints more debug output for various filters

fields.name: slowIRVerification
fields.description: Turns on LLVM IR verification after each mutation is applied

fields.name: debugEnabled
fields.description: Turns on debug output

fields.name: quiet
fields.description: Turns off any output except of warnings and errors

fields.name: silent
fields.description: Turns off any output

fields.name: includeNotCovered
fields.description: Controls whether `coverage` filter should skip mutants that are not covered. Disabled by default.

fields.name: junkDetectionDisabled
fields.description: Controls whether `junk detection` filter is enabled or not. Enabled by default.

fields.name: mutators
fields.description: Controls which mutators to turn on

fields.name: ignoreMutators
fields.description: Controls which mutators to turn off

fields.name: compilationDatabasePath
fields.description: Path to the compilation database (compile_commands.json)

fields.name: compilerFlags
fields.description: Additional compiler flags used for junk detection

fields.name: includePaths
fields.description: Controls behavior of `file path` filter

fields.name: excludePaths
fields.description: Controls behavior of `file path` filter

fields.name: parallelization
fields.description: Controls parallelization (both mutation and mutant execution)

fields.name: gitDiffRef
fields.description: Controls the git ref for `git diff` filter

fields.name: gitProjectRoot
fields.description: Controls the git repo location for `git diff` filter

fields.name: debug
fields.description: Controls various debug options
